nodes.bodyText:
Since 2.3.0 was released, the deprecated version should now be 2.4.0
Could we also add that these methods are going to be removed without a replacement? That is because API clients always expect alternative recommendations after such deprecations.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -239,7 +239,10 @@ public static String encrypt(String text, byte[] initVector, byte[] secretKey) { * @return encrypted text * @since 1.9 * Should encrypt short and long text + * + * @deprecated As of version 2.3.0, this method is not referenced in openmrs-core or any other projects under github OpenMRS organisation.
